H0.text: The Yalu river forms a sort of natural border between China and which of its neighbours. Russia

H1.text: The Yalu river forms a sort of natural border between China and which of its neighbours. Mongolia

H2.text: The Yalu river forms a sort of natural border between China and which of its neighbours. India

H3.text: The Yalu river forms a sort of natural border between China and which of its neighbours. 북한

A4.text: The Yalu River (Chinese: 鸭绿江; pinyin: Yālù Jiāng) or Amnok River (Korean: 압록강; MR: Amnokkang) is a river on the border between China and North Korea.

A5.text: Together with the Tumen River to its east, and a small portion of Paektu Mountain, the Yalu forms the border between China and North Korea.
